original_text: There is a league between me and thee, as there was between my father and thy father: behold, I have sent thee silver and gold; go, break thy league with Baasha king of Israel, that he may depart from me.
korean_text: 내 아버지와 당신의 아버지 사이에와 같이 나와 당신 사이에 약조하자 내가 당신에게 은금을 보내노니 와서 이스라엘 왕 바아사와 세운 약조를 깨뜨려 그가 나를 떠나게 하라 하매

sentences.original_text: There is a league between me and thee
as there was between my father and thy father
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지와 네 아버지 사이에 있었던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: I have sent thee silver and gold
break thy league with Baasha king of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 왕 바아사와의 너의 동맹을 깨뜨려라

sentences.original_text: that he may depart from me
